I’d been hurt before

no one’s ever

I won’t lie
to you

not right for you

the one that you want

all your time

situation

you want it to stop
I know
I can treat you
Better than he can
and any girl

wasting time
On all
your wasted crying
When you should be
with me instead
I know
I can treat you better
Better than
he can
I’ll stop time for you
the second you say

I just wanna give you
The loving

Would be everything

so different
Tell me
what you want to do
‘Cause I know
I can treat you
Better than he can
and any girl
Like you deserves

Tell me why are we
wasting time
On all

When you should be

I know
